vscode-auto-barrel.files.include.description: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is ts, js, json, html, css, scss, less.

vscode-auto-barrel.files.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

vscode-auto-barrel.files.showPath.description: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files
